about_the_game:
Iron Convoy: Survive, Conquer, and Thrive in the Wastes

Iron Convoy is a tactical survival game set in a harsh post-apocalyptic wasteland where you lead a convoy of battle-ready vehicles and desperate survivors. Scavenge resources, craft upgrades, and engage in strategic turn-based combat while navigating a dangerous open world filled with environmental hazards and rival factions.

"You are not the savior of these lands. You are the master of your convoy, a leader who will stop at nothing to dominate the wasteland." -Emperor Madal

Customize, Craft, and Upgrade

Turn salvaged resources and loot into powerful upgrades for your convoy. Craft advanced vehicle parts, strengthen your defenses, and improve your weapons to gain the upper hand in combat. Scavenge, barter, or steal whatever you need to stay ahead of your enemies.

Explore the Wasteland

Navigate a sprawling open world inspired by the unforgiving deserts of a post-apocalyptic Earth. Discover salvage points, abandoned facilities, and hidden locations, each holding treasures—and dangers—that can tip the scales in your favor. Beware of environmental hazards like sandstorms and acid rain that can cripple your convoy and leave you vulnerable.

Tactical Turn-Based Combat

Engage in tense, strategic, turn-based battles where the positioning of your convoy's vehicles can mean the difference between victory and defeat. Plan your actions carefully—attack, defend, repair, or unleash special abilities—to outsmart your enemies. The lead vehicle in your convoy determines the first strike, so organize your convoy wisely before each encounter.

Forge or Break Alliances

Navigate a complex web of factions vying for control of the wasteland. Your choices will shape your relationships with these groups, from hostile raiders to enigmatic scavenger guilds. Allies may come to your aid in combat, while enemies will relentlessly hunt you down. In this world, loyalty is rare, and trust is a dangerous game.

Lead a Convoy of Desperate Survivors

Build and command a convoy of battle-hardened vehicles, each equipped with unique weaponry and abilities. Recruit and assign crew members with distinct skillsets—mechanics, scavengers, sharpshooters, and more—to ensure your convoy remains operational and effective. Assemble a ragtag group of desperate individuals, each with their own backstory, strengths, and quirks, and assign them to roles that will determine your survival.

Day-Night Cycle and Environmental Challenges

Experience the relentless passage of time as day turns to night. At night, visibility drops, and movement slows, making ambushes and stealth tactics more likely. Stay vigilant as environmental hazards can strike unexpectedly, testing your convoy's resilience and resourcefulness.

Survive by Any Means

Fuel, food, and crew are your lifelines. Run out, and you’ll face devastating consequences—starving crew members may abandon you, and vehicles without operators will become sitting ducks. Keep your convoy running smoothly by scavenging and managing your resources wisely.

Iron Convoy: Forge Your Legacy

Whether you choose to build alliances, terrorize the weak, or carve out your own empire in the wastes, every decision will shape your convoy's fate. Your journey will be one of survival, domination, and unrelenting ambition.

The sands await. Will you rise above the chaos, or become another forgotten scrap in the wasteland?

content_descriptors.notes: Iron Convoy is a game set in a harsh post-apocalyptic world, focusing on themes of violence and survival. The story features raiding, combat, and tough decision-making, without including any sexual content or depictions of sexual assault. Themes like alcohol and drug use are lightly referenced, while self-harm or other sensitive topics are not directly portrayed.
